Reviews.Title: Fine product
Reviews.Author: V. Roger Rubin
Reviews.Content: Excellent product-very innovative and the price is right. My only complaint is a lack of a focus (diopter) control- but for the money it is great. VRR

Reviews.Title: hood focus issue
Reviews.Author: Dr. T
Reviews.Content: Received on time, but am frustrated in that the focus plane is not adjustable, and it doesn't seem to focus correctly for my eyes, with or without glasses (and I have fairly good vision). It appears to be focused about an inch in front of the mount plane. (I.E., if I hold the mount about an inch off the camera the image is sharp.) If I can't correct this somehow I will seek to return it.  I do like the mount scheme in that it does not require me to glue something to the camera. The screw-on mount seems to work well, and the magnetic hood mounts firmly. It's just that the image is not sharp.

ProductInfo.Features:
One (1) viewfinder with an eye cup and magnifying lens
One (1) magnetic mounting bracket
2.8X LCD Screen Viewfinder
Two elements optical glass design. Smart magnetic mechanism, and camera tripod mount attaching.
Fotasy Premier Lens Cleaning Cloth
ProductInfo.Name: Rainbowimaging 2.8x LCD viewfinder loupes for CANON EOS M EF-M Mount Mirrorless Camera, with Fotasy premier Cleaning Cloth
